list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add Dou.ua scraper and integrate into vacancy scraper
This commit introduces a new scraper for Dou.ua and integrates it into the existing Android vacancy scraper.
- Added `DouScraper.kt` to handle scraping job listings from Dou.ua. - Updated `Main.kt` to include DouScraper for several companies (Promova, BetterMe, AMO, Boosta). - Temporarily commented out DjinniScraper for focused testing. - Includes logging for scraping stages and individual job parsing.

task.summary: docs: update README with installation and usage instructions & update test case
chore: update project version to actual

Initialize project with Ktor setup and MongoDB integration
This commit includes the basic structure for a Kotlin-based Ktor server. It sets up dependency injection with Koin, MongoDB integration, a routing framework, and basic utility endpoints. Additional configuration includes Gradle scripts, Dokka documentation tasks, and .editorconfig for consistent code styling.

Add support for Java 17, update README, and improve server logs
Updated the project to require Java 17 and revised the README with improved documentation and setup instructions. Enhanced the server initialization with detailed logging and added support for creating a runnable fat JAR for easier deployments.
Update README, enhance logging, and streamline setup

Refactor route registration in UtilRoutes
Simplify route registration logic by removing redundant helper functions and using a more concise approach. Merged route definitions directly into the `Routing.apply` block to improve readability and maintainability.
Refactor Android vacancy scraper with new models and logger

Add Dou.ua scraper and integrate into vacancy scraper
This commit introduces a new scraper for Dou.ua and integrates it into the existing Android vacancy scraper.
- Added `DouScraper.kt` to handle scraping job listings from Dou.ua. - Updated `Main.kt` to include DouScraper for several companies (Promova, BetterMe, AMO, Boosta). - Temporarily commented out DjinniScraper for focused testing. - Includes logging for scraping stages and individual job parsing.

MESSAGE.value: docs: update README with installation and usage instructions & update test case
chore: update project version to actual

Add initial project setup for Ktor-based CRUD application
This commit introduces the foundational structure for a Ktor-based server application. Key additions include Gradle build configuration, Koin dependency injection, MongoDB integration, and routing setup with utility endpoints. Also added essential project files like `.editorconfig`, `.gitignore`, and `README.md`.

Initialize Ktor CRUD project with essential setup
Added project configuration for a Ktor-based CRUD application, including Gradle build scripts, dependency management, and MongoDB integration. Implemented basic server setup, DI using Koin, utility routes, and initial tests.

Initialize project with Ktor setup and MongoDB integration
This commit includes the basic structure for a Kotlin-based Ktor server. It sets up dependency injection with Koin, MongoDB integration, a routing framework, and basic utility endpoints. Additional configuration includes Gradle scripts, Dokka documentation tasks, and .editorconfig for consistent code styling.

Add support for Java 17, update README, and improve server logs
Updated the project to require Java 17 and revised the README with improved documentation and setup instructions. Enhanced the server initialization with detailed logging and added support for creating a runnable fat JAR for easier deployments.
Update README, enhance logging, and streamline setup

Refactor route registration in UtilRoutes
Simplify route registration logic by removing redundant helper functions and using a more concise approach. Merged route definitions directly into the `Routing.apply` block to improve readability and maintainability.
Refactor Android vacancy scraper with new models and logger

Add Dou.ua scraper and integrate into vacancy scraper
This commit introduces a new scraper for Dou.ua and integrates it into the existing Android vacancy scraper.
- Added `DouScraper.kt` to handle scraping job listings from Dou.ua. - Updated `Main.kt` to include DouScraper for several companies (Promova, BetterMe, AMO, Boosta). - Temporarily commented out DjinniScraper for focused testing. - Includes logging for scraping stages and individual job parsing.

option.value:
Add Dou.ua scraper and integrate into vacancy scraper
This commit introduces a new scraper for Dou.ua and integrates it into the existing Android vacancy scraper.
- Added `DouScraper.kt` to handle scraping job listings from Dou.ua. - Updated `Main.kt` to include DouScraper for several companies (Promova, BetterMe, AMO, Boosta). - Temporarily commented out DjinniScraper for focused testing. - Includes logging for scraping stages and individual job parsing.
